name: Biking
about: Grab your helmet and get moving. And if you bike to work, you can save money while you get active.

name: Bodyweight exercises — like push-ups and squats
about: You can do bodyweight exercises anywhere — even at the office.

name: Jogging or running
about: Just starting out? Go at your own pace! Try running for just 1 minute and build up from there.

name: Jumping rope
about: You can jump rope indoors, outdoors — even at the office! Keep a rope in your car or desk so you're always ready to move.

name: Home repairs — like painting and cleaning gutters
about: Doing your own home repairs saves money — and it counts as physical activity!

name: Stairs
about: Taking the stairs is a great way to get a few more minutes of activity in your day! And if you have stairs at home, you can use them just like a stair climber machine at the gym.

name: Yoga
about: You can do yoga anywhere! Take a class to learn yoga poses, or watch online videos and practice at home.

name: Gardening and weeding
about: Gardening can be a real workout! Help your plants — and your muscles — grow strong.
